feat.description: Start or finish a feature by branching from an epic branch
examples: $ tflow feat start: Create a new feature.
$ tflow feat finish: Finishes the feature and creates a PR towards the epic branch.

create.name: create
create.description: force creation of an epic branch

hotfix.description: Start or finish a hotfix. A hotfix goes directly into all non-production environments
examples: $ tflow hotfix start: Create a new hotfix branch.
$ tflow hotfix finish: Finishes the hotfix and creates a PR towards dev and staging

release.description: Release an epic to a test environment

epic.name: epic
epic.description: The name of the epic to release (will be prompted if left out)

version.name: version
version.description: The version to release (will be prompted if left out)
